## Visualization One:

This visualization expresses general popularity of genres within a given year. The graphs allow users to see the differences in genre popularity in this snapshot using a bar graph. The data within the graph simply shows a count of total streams of a genre. 

![Example graphic representation to answer our first inquiry](./graph_one.jpg)

## Visualization Two:

This visualization expresses comparisons of popularity of the top song within a genre in a given year. Again, a bar graph is used to communicate the differences of stream count. 

![Example graphic representation to answer our second inquiry](./graph_two.jpg)

## Visualization Three:

This visualization expresses in a clear format of trend of number of streams of all music throughout the years. This shows how streaming as a platform of music changes by utilizing a line chart which expresses trends effectively. 

![Example graphic representation to answer our third inquiry](./graph_three.jpg)

## Visualization Four:

This visualization expresses comparison of general quality of the top songs within genres. A column graph is utilized here to express comparisons within a genre, and then compared to other genres. 

![Example graphic representation to answer our fourth and final inquiry](./graph_four.jpg)
